alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 6:04PM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Areas near Chinle, Kayenta and Page. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 11 AM Thursday: Chinle 3 to 5 inches Kayenta 4 to 6 inches Page 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
